title: Cracking the Vault

panel_structure.description: The Architect surrounded by scattered coins of philosophical concepts, reading notes with genuine excitement about Evan's breakthrough
Close-up of the 'coins'—each one a different aspect of subjective ontology, casually spilled as if they were everyday objects rather than profound mysteries

transformation_notes: The Architect celebrates Evan's ability to handle deep philosophical questions with casual ease—'cracking the vault' of consciousness and treating its treasures as pocket change.
